articles.author: COLLIN BINKLEY
articles.title: US children fall further behind in reading, make little improvement in math on national exam - The Associated Press
articles.description: New results from a national exam find that America’s children have continued to lose ground on reading skills in the wake of the COVID-19 pandemic and have made little improvement in math. The findings are yet another setback for U.S. schools and reflect the …
articles.content: WASHINGTON (AP) Americas children have continued to lose ground on reading skills in the wake of the COVID-19 pandemic and have made little improvement in math, according to the latest results of an … [+8161 chars]
